node.text:
WELCOME TO LE RÊVE 
Singer-songwriter Mya’s life takes an unexpected turn following a visit from her estranged sibling Ari.

Watch the entire five-part Balmain x @Channel4 Original Series and discover the #BALMAINFW21 wardrobe on fractureseries.com and balmain.com.

Directed by @bradleyandpablo. Original Music by @jessejostark. Creative Direction by @olivier_rousteing. 

Cast: @jessejostark @tommy.dorfman @melton @ajvni

node.text:
“What made this project so exciting is that we didn’t think much about fashion, the focus was on the characters and their experiences.” @olivier_rousteing

In a world first, Balmain has teamed up with UK-based broadcaster @channel4 for "Fracture", an episodic drama series starring @jessejostark, @tommy.dorfman, @melton and @ajvni, directed by @bradleyandpablo. 

The five-part miniseries follows singer-songwriter Mya as she struggles to find her own voice. While fateful encounters with fellow residents at the rundown Le Reve motel and an estranged sibling force her to confront old wounds. 

With each episode featuring #BALMAINFW21 looks that evoke the characters’ essence, in addition to original music from @jessejostark created for the series, "Fracture" brings a whole new dimension of storytelling to the adventurous and rebellious collection. 

Coming September 2nd to fractureseries.com.

node.text: Since its founding in 1945, the House of Balmain has remained particularly attached to promoting French craftsmanship. From Monsieur Balmain’s bespoke confections to @olivier_rousteing’s modern atelier, the house’s couture tradition lives on. On this 14th of July, dive into the Balmain archives and celebrate the origins of the New French Style for yourself. #BALMAINHERITAGE #BALMAINCOUTURE

✈️ #BalmainAboveAndBeyond #BalmainFW21

Directed by @valentinpetit90 
Creative direction @olivier_rousteing 
Styling @katielyall and @stockdale.charlotte 
Casting @giuliamassullo 

Production
Balmain Paris
@division.global 
@lamodeenimages 

Post-production: Everest

Make up @isamayaffrench 
Hair Styling @sammcknight1 

Music Supervision: @michelgaubert 

"Knee 1" (From Opera Einstein On The Beach - 1976) By Philip Glass 
(Robert Wilson, Philip Glass) 
©️ Dunvagen Music Publishers admin by Chester Music Ltd 
(p)Orange Mountain Music (2009)

“Lifetime”(Planningtorock 'Let It Happen' Remix) by Romy 
(Romy Madley Croft, Fred Gibson, Henri Counsell) 
Courtesy of Young Turks Recordings / Universal Music Publishing / Warner Chappell Music France

Special thanks to @airfrance and the whole team of the Air France Industries Hangars 

With the invaluable support of 
@dysonhair 
@lorealparis 
@swarovski

node.text:
A history that goes back almost 75 years.
Get an indepth look at the connection between France and the US from past to present Creative Directors, in Ep. 3 of “L’atelier Balmain” now streaming on Apple Podcast. 🎧
In light of the recent inauguration, we are hopeful for a better future in light of this new beginning. 
Our story goes on. 
#BALMAINHERITAGE

node.text:
We wanted to give you a very private access to our next #BalmainPF21 collection shooting.
Our Saint Honoré store windows were the perfect theater for such a shared creative process, directly to your screen or by the Paris street, and shot by Olivier Rousteing. We are Balmain Ensemble 🤍🖤 
#BALMAINENSEMBLE

node.title: #BALMAINPF21 | Shot Live at the Saint-Honoré Boutique

node.text:
After so many years and even more collections, our team has grown very close always relying on honesty, talent, love for creation and fresh ideas. Our trip from Paris to Normandy marked the end of a difficult period and allowed us to share the joy of being with each other again and celebrating what we managed to achieve, despite the challenges.

Here is Balmain Resort 21, shot by @olivier_rousteing at @chateau_gonneville_surhonfleur. 
Make-up: @samira_pikpo 
Hair: @kyris.eracleous for @balmainhaircouture 
#BalmainEnsemble

node.text:
Dear @Beyonce, 
Thank you for sharing your powerful message of hope with the graduates of 2020—and with all of us—yesterday.
Your words moved us. Thank you for making it clear that today, "in the midst of a global crisis, a racial pandemic, and worldwide expression of outrage at the senseless killing of yet another unarmed Black human being”—that "our collective hearts, when put to positive action, could start the wheels of change.”
We share your hope in the fantastic potential of this new generation—and like you, we are proud of the many young voices joining together to loudly affirm that Black Lives Matter.
As always, we learn from your example and we are inspired by your vision.
Love and respect from the House of Balmain.

node.text:
ZENDAYA
Actress @zendaya takes the 78th Annual Venice International Film Festival by storm in custom Balmain for the premiere of her film “Dune”. The bespoke leather gown was crafted using an exact model of the stars’ bust, taking full advantage of the Balmain atelier and the house’s artisanal tradition. #BALMAINARMY

Styling by @luxurylaw

node.text:
WELCOME TO LE RÊVE 
Singer-songwriter Mya’s life takes an unexpected turn following a visit from her estranged sibling Ari.

Watch the entire five-part Balmain x @Channel4 Original Series and discover the #BALMAINFW21 wardrobe on fractureseries.com and balmain.com.

Directed by @bradleyandpablo. Original Music by @jessejostark. Creative Direction by @olivier_rousteing. 

Cast: @jessejostark @tommy.dorfman @melton @ajvni

node.text:
EDIE
Meet Edie, Mya’s joyful neighbor and friend, played by @ajvni for the Balmain x @Channel4 original series Fracture.

Wardrobe choice was an important part in bringing her character to life as Creative Director @olivier_rousteing gave each talent the unique opportunity to choose the #BALMAINFW21 looks that best reflected their character. Tying a strong sense of freedom to and exploration to both the series and the collection.

Get to know Edie in Fracture, coming September 2nd to fractureseries.com. And learn more on balmain.com. #FRACTURESERIES

BALMAIN BRIGADE
On the run with the BALMAIN Brigade-II. Featuring architecturally-inspired side shields and lightweight titanium hardware in rich gold tones, this versatile pair adds a taste of adventure for any wardrobe. #BALMAINEYEWEAR

node.text:
NOA 
In the upcoming Balmain x @Channel4 original series Fracture, @melton plays Noa. A brooding poet that has ended up at Le Rêve Motel - lost, like so many of its residents. 

For @melton, wardrobe played an important role in finding his character: Creative Director @olivier_rousteing gave the stars the unique opportunity to choose the #BALMAINFW21 looks they felt best reflected their character. Tying a strong sense of freedom to both the series and the collection. 

Get to know Noa in Fracture, coming September 2nd to fractureseries.com. And learn more on Balmain.com. #FRACTURESERIES

node.text:
ARI
Say hello to Ari. Played by actress @tommy.dorfman for the upcoming Balmain x @Channel4 series Fracture, the ambitious young professional has tracked their estranged sister Mya to Le Rêve Motel L.A. 

From power shoulders to pastel tailoring, wardrobe was without a doubt an integral part in bringing Ari to life. As Creative Director @olivier_rousteing gave the stars the unique opportunity to choose the #BALMAINFW21 looks they felt best reflected their character. Tying a strong sense of freedom to both the series and the collection. 

Get to know Ari in Fracture, coming September 2nd to fractureseries.com. And learn more on Balmain.com. #FRACTURESERIES

node.text:
MYA
Musician @jessejostark breathes life into Fracture’s key protagonist Mya, a talented singer-songwriter searching for inspiration and escape at the rundown Le Rêve Motel.

Beyond taking on the role, the star dedicated her own creative inspiration to the character, penning the series’ feature single “A Pretty Place To Fall Apart” upon reading the script. Not to mention a keen eye for the #BALMAINFW21 looks that best embody Mya’s rebellious spirit. 

Get to know Mya in Fracture coming September 2nd. And learn more of Balmain.com. #FRACTURESERIES

node.text:
MYA 
Meet Mya. The talented singer-songwriter searching for inspiration and escape at the rundown Le Rêve Motel, brought to life on screen by @jessejostark, at the center of the @balmain x @channel4 original series Fracture. 

Wardrobe was without a doubt an integral part of this process: Balmain Creative Director @olivier_rousteing gave each talent the unique opportunity to choose the #BALMAINFW21 looks they felt most accurately reflected their character. Tying a strong sense of freedom and adventure to both the series and the collection. 

Catch Fracture on fractureseries.com starting September 2nd. And learn more on Balmain.com. #FRACTURESERIES
